name.atLeastCharac: Field name require a minimum of 10 characters

email.valid: Field name require to be a valid email address

first.title: Your project is also mine
first.description: The main thing that convinced me to become a freelancer is that I know that a project I chose is more important that a project I integrate. It clearly turns me as it is my own project when I work for my clients

second.title: How I love work ?
second.description: Always dynamic and with a smile. A good day at the office for me it's a moment of sharing with my team where I learned something in my day and where I felt useful

javascript.title: Javascript
javascript.description: Very famous language for developing frontend web application, also used in backend development nowadays

golang.title: Golang
golang.description: Developed by Google, strong typed language and easy to read. Golang is making its place on the market

nodejs.title: Node.js
nodejs.description: Easy to learn, Node.js allows us to have Javascript in both frontend and backend sides

mongo.title: Mongo DB
mongo.description: Base on JSON documents, much more efficient and expressive than the traditional model based on rows and columns
